trainers.name: Swing Peter Pete
trainers.loseText: You swinged so high, you are my new swinging idol
trainers.winText: This was fun! How about another try later?

trainers.name: Carrousel Lady Eugenia
trainers.engageText: Sometimes my grandson Pete joins me too
trainers.loseText: You are not a nice person
trainers.winText: Next time Pete will joins us for sure

trainers.name: Flying Dutchman Controller Jackson
trainers.engageText: You have to be this high to enter
trainers.loseText: small flies liek you will never enter
trainers.winText: This one got big really fast

trainers.name: One Man Free Fall Tower's guy in front of the queue
trainers.engageText: Do not you dare to queue jump!
trainers.winText: Now go back to the end of the queue

trainers.name: Speedy the Speeder
trainers.loseText: You listening to Darude Sandstorm too?
trainers.winText: You should listen to Darude Sandstorm while running, it makes everything 10% faster!

trainers.name: Why dont you just tell me where the missing crystals are?
trainers.winText: You dont. F'king. Talk to me. Like That. You little. Piece of. S*t haha
